INSERT INTO TB_ANSWER (ans_no, ques_no, content, writer) VALUES (#{ansNo}, #{quesNo}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT ques_no, ans_no, content, writer, reg_date, view_cnt, like_cnt FROM TB_ANSWER WHERE ans_no=#{ansNo}
